rabbitmq.description: RabbitMQ configuration - host should point to load balancer

consumer.description: Consumer configuration - workers: number of consumer processes, prefetch_count: messages per worker, batch_size: number of records per batch , batch_timeout: maximum time (seconds) to wait before flushing batch

logging.description: Logging configuration for consumer service - log_file: log file path, level: logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL), max_bytes: max log file size before rotation (default 10MB), backup_count: number of backup files to keep (default 5), json_format: enable structured JSON logging (default false)
